mapper.select: select to_char(created_at, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as created_at, substr(content_notag, 0, 15) || '.....' as content_notag from diaries where email = #{username} and content like '%'||#{searchInput}||'%'
select count(*) from visited where diary_id = #{diaryId} and heart = 'Y'
mapper.insert: insert into reply(reply_id, diary_id, replyContent, writer_email) values (reply_seq.nextval, #{diaryId}, #{comment}, #{username})
mapper.select: select replyContent, writer_email, to_char(created_at_reply, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') as created_at_reply from reply where diary_id = #{diaryId} order by created_at_reply desc
